localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

I awoke in a cold sweat on a cold, damp brick floor. Pools of vile green slime oozed before me and skeletons flailed with their swords, driven by an unseen demonic power.

I took my spell book in trembling hands and muttered incantations as bolts of blue lightning flashed from my fingertips.

If I could achieve the impossible and survive this onslaught, my soul would be saved...

Package size: 189 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)

Copyright 2015 Gremlin Software Ltd

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
